title: Hey, Prof. Singer said it was cool
author: VD
content_html:
Let’s all shed a tear for this poor victim of a post-natal abortion. No, not the much-perforated unborn child, who we all know isn’t human even if it has actually been born, but rather, the traumatized young woman:

A 17-year-old stabbed her newborn baby 135 times and disposed of her body in a garbage can outside her home in Oakdale, authorities alleged Thursday.

Nicole Marie Beecroft was charged Thursday with first-degree murder. The charge carries a maximum sentence of life in prison. She was being held in a juvenile detention facility. Bail was set at $1 million on Friday afternoon.

“She kills the baby and now her life will be changed forever,” Washington County Attorney Doug Johnson said.

I won’t be surprised if she ends up serving less time than my father’s associate does. Because you can’t really blame a panicky young woman for stabbing a newborn baby over 100 times… see this is what happens when the Patriarchy bans abortion!

Obviously, the only solution is abortion clinics in every public school. And, of course, more sex ed.
